name: First Steps Badge
description: Complete your first habit. Great job!

name: Productivity Ribbon
description: Complete 4 habits in a single day.

name: Super Worker Ribbion
description: Complete 8 habits in a single day. You're awesome!

name: Workaholic Ribbon
description: Complete 18 habits in a single day. Get some rest...

name: Omega Badge
description: Complete every repeating individual habit for a single habit you've created. Amazing!
